caption.title: Four types of predictions of climate suitability for Pseudolarix amabilis in the future (2080)
caption.p: Four types of predictions of climate suitability for Pseudolarix amabilis in the future (2080) using climate layers generated by the following: UK Meteorological Office (UKMO) Hadley Centre Coupled Model, version 3 (HadCM3), under SRES A1B (A); Met Office Hadley Centre (MOHC) Hadley Centre Global Environmental Model, version 2 (HadGEM2-ES (Earth System)), under RCP 8.5 (B); Canadian Centre for Climate Modelling and Analysis (CCCma) third-generation Coupled Global Climate Model with T63 spectral resolution (CGCM3.1-T63) under SRES A1B (C); and Meteorological Research Institute (MRI) Coupled Global Climate Model, version 3 (CGCM3), under RCP 8.5 (D). The spatial data was freely downloaded from http://www.diva-gis.org/Data, the base map was generated by ArcGIS v.9.3 ( http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis/arcgis-for-desktop).
Click here for additional data file.
